content: This morning, we were running some errands. We were at a stop light, a guy went by on a Harley, I thought I saw Patriot Guard Riders on the back of his jacket. By the time the light turned green for us, he was too far ahead of us for me to see him. That brought to mind the Baptist Church in Kansas City, whose members show up at military funerals to protest the military. Does anyone remember the name of the church? Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...
reply: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...
title: The Patriot Guard Riders!

content: quote: Originally posted by Bergy46: Way to go Bergy!! Patriot Guard Riders Mission Statement The Patriot Guard Riders is a diverse amalgamation of riders from across the nation. We have one thing in common besides motorcycles. We have an unwavering respect for those who risk their very lives for America’s freedom and security. If you share this respect, please join us. We don’t care what you ride or if you ride, what your political views are, or whether you’re a hawk or a dove. It is not a requirement that you be a veteran. It doesn't matter where you’re from or what your income is; you don’t even have to ride. The only prerequisite is Respect. Our main mission is to attend the funeral services of fallen American heroes as invited guests of the family. Each mission we undertake has two basic objectives: 1. Show our sincere respect for our fallen heroes, their families, and their communities. 2. Shield the mourning family and their friends from interruptions created by any protestor or group of protestors. We accomplish the latter through strictly legal and non-violent means. To those of you who are currently serving and fighting for the freedoms of others, at home and abroad, please know that we are backing you. We honor and support you with every mission we carry out, and we are praying for a safe return home for all. * choose joy each day
reply: Way to go Bergy!! Patriot Guard Riders Mission Statement The Patriot Guard Riders is a diverse amalgamation of riders from across the nation. We have one thing in common besides motorcycles. We have an unwavering respect for those who risk their very lives for America’s freedom and security. If you share this respect, please join us. We don’t care what you ride or if you ride, what your political views are, or whether you’re a hawk or a dove. It is not a requirement that you be a veteran. It doesn't matter where you’re from or what your income is; you don’t even have to ride. The only prerequisite is Respect. Our main mission is to attend the funeral services of fallen American heroes as invited guests of the family. Each mission we undertake has two basic objectives: 1. Show our sincere respect for our fallen heroes, their families, and their communities. 2. Shield the mourning family and their friends from interruptions created by any protestor or group of protestors. We accomplish the latter through strictly legal and non-violent means. To those of you who are currently serving and fighting for the freedoms of others, at home and abroad, please know that we are backing you. We honor and support you with every mission we carry out, and we are praying for a safe return home for all. * choose joy each day
title: The Patriot Guard Riders!

content: I've ridden several missions with the PGR, including one where the Phelps crowd actually showed up. We ignored them. But, I only do the missions involving soldiers killed during the current war. A year or so ago, the PGR expanded its mission to include any Veteran's funeral, if the family wants, and with the number of WWII and Korean Vets passing every day, it could easily become a full time job. On any given day here in North Texas, there are 2 or 3 missions pending and I think that's just too much. I really wish they'd go back to their original mission of shielding the family from protestors and honoring those who are dying in combat right now. But, that's just me.
reply: I've ridden several missions with the PGR, including one where the Phelps crowd actually showed up. We ignored them. But, I only do the missions involving soldiers killed during the current war. A year or so ago, the PGR expanded its mission to include any Veteran's funeral, if the family wants, and with the number of WWII and Korean Vets passing every day, it could easily become a full time job. On any given day here in North Texas, there are 2 or 3 missions pending and I think that's just too much. I really wish they'd go back to their original mission of shielding the family from protestors and honoring those who are dying in combat right now. But, that's just me.

content: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...
reply: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...

content: quote: Originally posted by Bergy46: Way to go Bergy!! Patriot Guard Riders Mission Statement The Patriot Guard Riders is a diverse amalgamation of riders from across the nation. We have one thing in common besides motorcycles. We have an unwavering respect for those who risk their very lives for America’s freedom and security. If you share this respect, please join us. We don’t care what you ride or if you ride, what your political views are, or whether you’re a hawk or a dove. It is not a requirement that you be a veteran. It doesn't matter where you’re from or what your income is; you don’t even have to ride. The only prerequisite is Respect. Our main mission is to attend the funeral services of fallen American heroes as invited guests of the family. Each mission we undertake has two basic objectives: 1. Show our sincere respect for our fallen heroes, their families, and their communities. 2. Shield the mourning family and their friends from interruptions created by any protestor or group of protestors. We accomplish the latter through strictly legal and non-violent means. To those of you who are currently serving and fighting for the freedoms of others, at home and abroad, please know that we are backing you. We honor and support you with every mission we carry out, and we are praying for a safe return home for all. * choose joy each day

content: I've ridden several missions with the PGR, including one where the Phelps crowd actually showed up. We ignored them. But, I only do the missions involving soldiers killed during the current war. A year or so ago, the PGR expanded its mission to include any Veteran's funeral, if the family wants, and with the number of WWII and Korean Vets passing every day, it could easily become a full time job. On any given day here in North Texas, there are 2 or 3 missions pending and I think that's just too much. I really wish they'd go back to their original mission of shielding the family from protestors and honoring those who are dying in combat right now. But, that's just me.
reply: I've ridden several missions with the PGR, including one where the Phelps crowd actually showed up. We ignored them. But, I only do the missions involving soldiers killed during the current war. A year or so ago, the PGR expanded its mission to include any Veteran's funeral, if the family wants, and with the number of WWII and Korean Vets passing every day, it could easily become a full time job. On any given day here in North Texas, there are 2 or 3 missions pending and I think that's just too much. I really wish they'd go back to their original mission of shielding the family from protestors and honoring those who are dying in combat right now. But, that's just me.
title: The Patriot Guard Riders!

content: This morning, we were running some errands. We were at a stop light, a guy went by on a Harley, I thought I saw Patriot Guard Riders on the back of his jacket. By the time the light turned green for us, he was too far ahead of us for me to see him. That brought to mind the Baptist Church in Kansas City, whose members show up at military funerals to protest the military. Does anyone remember the name of the church? Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

I really wish they'd go back to their original mission of shielding the family from protestors and honoring those who are dying in combat right now. But, that's just me.
title: The Patriot Guard Riders!

content: This morning, we were running some errands. We were at a stop light, a guy went by on a Harley, I thought I saw Patriot Guard Riders on the back of his jacket. By the time the light turned green for us, he was too far ahead of us for me to see him. That brought to mind the Baptist Church in Kansas City, whose members show up at military funerals to protest the military. Does anyone remember the name of the church? Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...
reply: ... ...We,(PGRNY) just rode last week, and "Welcomed Home" 55 Marines from Fox 2/25 at the Albany County Airport after 3 tours, and escorted them To the Stratton Air base in Scotia NY,.. ...There wer approx 1000 people, family, and friends there waiting as 50, or so bikes led them home,... ...Cheers erupted, and hands clapped as they heard us coming as if we hand carried them home ourselves to waitng arms,... ...It's a sight to behold when a Mother, or Wife, or girlfriend embraces them for the first time in a long time,... ... ...

content: quote: Originally posted by Bergy46: Way to go Bergy!! Patriot Guard Riders Mission Statement The Patriot Guard Riders is a diverse amalgamation of riders from across the nation. We have one thing in common besides motorcycles. We have an unwavering respect for those who risk their very lives for America’s freedom and security. If you share this respect, please join us. We don’t care what you ride or if you ride, what your political views are, or whether you’re a hawk or a dove. It is not a requirement that you be a veteran. It doesn't matter where you’re from or what your income is; you don’t even have to ride. The only prerequisite is Respect. Our main mission is to attend the funeral services of fallen American heroes as invited guests of the family. Each mission we undertake has two basic objectives: 1. Show our sincere respect for our fallen heroes, their families, and their communities. 2. Shield the mourning family and their friends from interruptions created by any protestor or group of protestors. We accomplish the latter through strictly legal and non-violent means. To those of you who are currently serving and fighting for the freedoms of others, at home and abroad, please know that we are backing you. We honor and support you with every mission we carry out, and we are praying for a safe return home for all. * choose joy each day
reply: Way to go Bergy!! Patriot Guard Riders Mission Statement The Patriot Guard Riders is a diverse amalgamation of riders from across the nation. We have one thing in common besides motorcycles. We have an unwavering respect for those who risk their very lives for America’s freedom and security. If you share this respect, please join us. We don’t care what you ride or if you ride, what your political views are, or whether you’re a hawk or a dove. It is not a requirement that you be a veteran. It doesn't matter where you’re from or what your income is; you don’t even have to ride. The only prerequisite is Respect. Our main mission is to attend the funeral services of fallen American heroes as invited guests of the family. Each mission we undertake has two basic objectives: 1. Show our sincere respect for our fallen heroes, their families, and their communities. 2. Shield the mourning family and their friends from interruptions created by any protestor or group of protestors. We accomplish the latter through strictly legal and non-violent means. To those of you who are currently serving and fighting for the freedoms of others, at home and abroad, please know that we are backing you. We honor and support you with every mission we carry out, and we are praying for a safe return home for all. * choose joy each day
title: The Patriot Guard Riders!
